name: Modern Sofa
description: A sleek modern sofa with clean lines and comfortable cushions.

name: Classic Sofa
description: A timeless classic sofa with elegant design and plush seating.

name: Sectional Sofa
description: A spacious sectional sofa perfect for large living rooms and gatherings.

name: Recliner Sofa
description: A comfortable recliner sofa with adjustable seating for ultimate relaxation.

name: Sleeper Sofa
description: A versatile sleeper sofa that easily converts into a bed for guests.

name: Loveseat Sofa
description: A cozy loveseat sofa perfect for small spaces and intimate settings.

name: Chesterfield Sofa
description: A luxurious Chesterfield sofa with deep button tufting and rolled arms.

name: Mid-Century Modern Sofa
description: A stylish mid-century modern sofa with tapered legs and vibrant upholstery.

name: Convertible Sofa
description: A functional convertible sofa that can be adjusted for different seating arrangements.

name: Outdoor Sofa
description: A durable outdoor sofa designed to withstand the elements while providing comfort.

name: Honey combe
description: A comfortable recliner sofa with adjustable seating for ultimate relaxation.

name: Neon Horizon
description: This sofa is a direct homage to Snythwave and Cyberpunk aesthetics. It trades organic curves for a more structured, cantilevered look.

name: Pulse
description: This design focuses on texture and rhythm. The body of the sofa is divided into vertical, pillowy segments, giving it an undulating, cloud-like appearance.

name: Orbit
description: A bold, experimental piece that leans into Googie architecture. The sofa features a continuous, sweeping white outer shell that terminates in a dramatic, floor-level tail.

name: Galactic Regency
description: This formal set features a tri-tone palette of bone white, charcoal, and polished gold.

name: Orbit Asymmetrical Sectional
description: A bold Googie-style sofa with a sweeping white outer shell and vibrant tangerine and teal accents.

name: Pulse Sculptural Sofa
description: Features undulating vertical segments in cloud-white with bright orange pop-art side cut-outs.

name: Neon Horizon Streamliner
description: A synthwave-inspired sofa with a cantilevered frame and integrated red-to-yellow gradient panels.

name: Nebula Pod Chair
description: A high-gloss fiberglass swivel chair with a recessed deep-blue velvet interior.

name: Stardust Coffee Table
description: A kidney-shaped smoked glass table supported by tapered, polished chrome orbital legs.

name: Solaris Lounge Set
description: Modular seating system featuring liquid-motion curves and silver metallic upholstery.

name: Lunar Pedestal Table
description: An hourglass-shaped side table made of matte white polymer with a gold-leaf top inlay.

name: Event Horizon Console
description: A floating media unit with rounded corners and sliding doors in perforated aluminum.

name: Cosmos Ottoman Set
description: A set of three pebble-shaped stools in graduated shades of neon violet and ash.

name: Zero-G Bed Frame
description: A levitating bed design with a wrap-around padded headboard and under-glow LED lighting.

name: Pulsar Nightstand
description: Spherical bedside unit featuring a touch-to-open drawer and wireless charging top.

name: Infinity Wall Shelf
description: A modular S-shaped shelving unit made of translucent neon-amber acrylic.

name: Photon Floor Lamp
description: A slender triple-headed arc lamp with chrome shades and a heavy marble base.

name: Supernova Dining Table
description: Circular white marble table with a central starburst pedestal in brushed brass.

name: Astro Vanity Mirror
description: Irregular oval mirror with a deep-set frame containing color-changing smart LEDs.

name: Titanium Wave Bench
description: A seamless, liquid-metal style bench made from polished aluminum with a high-gloss finish.

name: Aura Smart Mirror
description: A full-length frameless mirror with voice-activated perimeter lighting and a hidden digital clock.

name: Cyber-Knot Accent Chair
description: A complex, 3D-printed lattice structure seat in matte neon green with a black carbon-fiber base.

name: Vortex Dining Table
description: Features a swirling black resin top with embedded gold leaf 'galaxies' and a heavy chrome pedestal.

name: Glitch-Pattern Rug
description: A low-pile silk rug with a pixelated digital distortion pattern in shades of cobalt and charcoal.

name: Ion Bar Stool
description: Transparent acrylic seat with a single-stemmed base finished in a 'chameleon' iridescent coat.

name: Hyper-Sleep Bedside Lamp
description: A minimalist white dome lamp that uses red-spectrum light to promote natural sleep cycles.

name: Synapse Home Office Desk
description: A streamlined workstation with an integrated touch-panel surface and built-in cable management conduits.

name: Gravity-Defy Bookshelf
description: A wall-mounted unit with hidden brackets that makes books appear to float against the wall.

name: Plasma Accent Pillow Set
description: Four cushions made of heat-sensitive 'mood' fabric that changes color when touched.

name: Vector Armchair
description: Sharp, geometric lounge chair with a steel frame and electric-blue leather padding.

name: Neutrino Coffee Station
description: Compact matte-black island with a waterfall edge and built-in pods for smart-appliances.

name: Prism Pendant Light
description: Dichroic glass pyramid that casts rainbow-colored shadows across the room.

name: Obsidian Sofa Bed
description: Convertible sleeper in black faux-ostrich leather with high-density memory foam cushions.

name: Zenith Wall Clock
description: A floating magnetic sphere that orbits the center plate to tell time without traditional hands.

name: Data-Flow Room Divider
description: A semi-transparent mesh screen with programmable fiber-optic wires woven into the fabric.

name: Apex Gaming Throne
description: Ergonomic chair with haptic feedback vibrations and built-in 5.1 surround sound headrest.

name: Cryo-Glass Display Cabinet
description: Frost-tinted glass case with internal temperature control for wine or high-end collectibles.

name: Binary Nesting Tables
description: A set of two circular metal tables that fit perfectly into each other, featuring circuit-board etchings.

name: Velociti Coat Rack
description: A single piece of bent orange neon-coated steel that functions as a sculptural coat hanger.

name: Nova Vanity Set
description: A glossy white desk with a flip-top mirror and rose-gold metallic interior compartments.

name: Quasar Lounge Ottoman
description: An oversized, star-shaped pouf covered in reflective silver spandex fabric.

name: Aileron Wall Sconce
description: Sleek aerodynamic wing-shaped light that washes the wall in a soft purple glow.

name: Mach-1 Dining Chair
description: Lightweight carbon-fiber frame with a minimal seat and high-back support.

name: Fusion Hearth
description: A ventless bio-ethanol fireplace housed in a sphere of heat-resistant glass and black steel.
